sentence: When the progressive establishment asks, “why can’t we all just get along,” or “how do we heal America?” what they are really saying is they long to return to the day when everyone knew their place and today’s MAGA fighters like Jenny Beth Martin, Kimberly Fletcher, Tom Fitton, James O’Keefe, Charlie Kirk, Jim Jordan, Chip Roy, Lauren Boebert, Louie Gohmert, Josh Hawley, Mike Lee, Rand Paul, Ted Cruz, Ron DeSantis and Donald Trump were not rocking the boat and effectively opposing their ”woke” agenda.
author: Richard A. Viguerie
title: Why Can’t We All Get Along?
